description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=1/3. In this exciting new game, you take the role of a mere egg cell fighting off legions of sperm who dream of inseminating you. Fortunately, you have been equipped with the most powerful birth control known to man. Help the egg stop the waves of sperm, and make sure the pill works! Warning: The sperm is unlike anything ever conceived. This game brings a new meaning to the battle of the sexes!
